初遇.encontent:
(You smell like a friend.) (Before you pat me on the head,) (could
 you please try and tell me, does every species have the same
 kind of soul?)"lnstead of a pat on the head, the puppy prefers
 a handshake like a friend."
初遇.content:
<朋友的味道。><先别摸我的头——><请试着回答我
，是不是所有物种的灵魂都相同？>“相比抚摸头颅，小
狗更希望能与你握手相谈。”

箱中气候.encontent:
(We don't get to see such nice weather often ... The
 rain separates everyone, while the river outside the
 window flows upstream.)
箱中气候.content:
<难得的好天气……雨幕把所有人都隔绝开来，窗外淌着
逆流的河。>

致未来.encontent:
(An everlasting space where there is no disc or globe
 but eternal time, can you imagine that?)
致未来.content:
<你能想象到吗？一个永恒的时间与空间，没有狗狗飞盘
或任何球状物的地方。>

孑立.encontent:
"The puppy expressed his lasting loneliness. He may
 require some adequate physical reassurance."
孑立.content: “小狗表达了它长久的孤独，或许它需要妥善的抚慰。”

问候.encontent:
"The puppy is delighted by your visit. He is about
 ..."
问候.content: “小狗对你的到来感到欣喜。他应该——”

朝晨.encontent:
(I am going to have breakfast in my room. Please allow
 me to spend the moment alone.)
朝晨.content:
<我准备把早餐拖进房间里，请你容许这段小小的独处时
光。>

信任-朝晨.encontent:
(Two Kenkel's crackers and a bowl of canned short ribs ... )(It
 is highly possible that their offer will result in the corruption
 of a puppy warrior's independent will. )(Of course they also
 work on a puppy philosopher's.)
信任-朝晨.content:
<两份“啃啃乐”饼干脆，一碗牛肋骨罐头……><这极
有可能会腐蚀一位狗狗战士的独立意志。><当然，对狗
狗哲学家也一样。>

夜暮.encontent:
(This is the time when most people open their hearts to each
 other, so is for puppies ...) (I have heard Wendy's soulful
 confession over 30 times and sometimes, to be honest, I'm envious
 of her straightforwardness.)
夜暮.content:
<人们大多选择在这个时候互诉衷肠，就连小狗们也不例
外……><我已经听过了不下三十次温迪的深情演讲，偶
尔我也羡慕它的直白。>

信任-夜暮.encontent:
"The puppy assures you that he will be by your side
 throughout the night, and suggests reading ..."
信任-夜暮.content:
“小狗表示他会守护在你身边，并将这一段漫长的夜色用
于阅读……”

帽檐与发鬓.encontent: (... Relax your fingers, go down, down, down ...)

袖与手.encontent:
(Thank you for your kind greeting, and remember to wash your
 hand. I just stepped on something you may find unpleasant.)
 "The puppy would like to keep that smell a secret."
袖与手.content:
<多谢你的善意，记得洗手。我刚才踩了会让你不愉快的
东西。>“对于小狗而言，这是一个有味道的秘密。”

衣着与身形.encontent:
(I do lose hair regularly. I'm very sorry about your
 floor.)
衣着与身形.content:
<我确实会周期性地掉一些毛。对你的地板，我感到很抱
歉。>

嗜好.encontent:
(Doggie is way too warmhearted and acute in most of
 the time ...) (Its battery is unbelievably long-lasting.)
嗜好.content:
<“Doggie”时常表现得过于热情，也过于敏锐……><它
的电池充沛得令人讶异。>

赞赏.encontent:
(I thought a space of my own and plenty of time to spend alone
 were just a dream ...)(But that dream has come true. Everything
 is so different and amazing here.)
赞赏.content:
<我本以为无人打扰的房间与充裕的独处时光仅仅存在于
梦中……><然而，现在的一切都是那么的非同凡响。>

亲昵.encontent:
(I'm not a neat freak, but could you clean my body
 with a modest amount of water?)( I will control it
 when I shake.)
亲昵.content:
<我并没有洁癖，但适当的，请你用水冲一冲我的身体。><我
不会把水甩得到处都是的。>

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
(Never thought there would be so many unusual characters here,
 even the word "special" feels different now.) "The puppy hopes
 your friendship lasts forever, no matter if he's the unique
 friend or not among the special friends of yours."
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
<……与众不同的朋友多得难以想象，在这里，“特别”的
意义发生了改变。>“但愿小狗能始终作为你的朋友之一
，不论是特别的，还是普通的。”

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
(I tried to find inner peace,) (but now it turns out
 to be a boomerang game: the best way to get it is
 to wait.)
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
<我一度努力寻找内心的平静。><但现在看来，平静就
像狗狗回旋镖，获得它的最好方式只有等待。>

独白.encontent:
(I was once stuck with nihilism after a certain setback. )(I
 thought life no longer had any meaning, but then a ball fell
 down the stairs and I was, enlightened.) (I didn't want it to
 reach me, so I need to keep running forward, whatever it takes.)
独白.content:
<在挫败后，我曾短暂地陷入虚无主义。><我感到意义
离我而去，在那一刻，是从楼梯滚下来的球唤起了我的意
识。><我不愿意碰它，所以我要不顾一切往前跑。>

召唤至终的仪式.encontent:
(On top of the ladder of progress, there stands a dog
 interwined in happiness and pain.)
召唤至终的仪式.content: <阶梯之上，快乐的小狗与痛苦的小狗。>

受敌Ⅱ.encontent:
(Please put me through to the Animal Protection Society
 ...)

战斗胜利.encontent:
"Warning! Warning! The puppy is fleeing the scene at
 its maximum speed."
战斗胜利.content: “警告！警告！小狗正以最快的速度逃离现场。”

洞悉.encontent:
(This may be too much for a puppy, but is just fine
 for an arcanist.)
洞悉.content:
<这对一只小狗而言分量甚重，对于神秘学家而言则恰到
好处。>

洞悉之底.encontent:
(Sometimes things go wrong, even in a puppy's life
 ... Smile, hand shake, next.)
洞悉之底.content:
<故事的发展总有不尽如犬意的时候……微笑，握手，下
一位。>
